name: Heart of Gold: The Rift
description:
Made for a college project, A young girl finds herself in a world not unlike the one she knows. A robot calling itself Machine Code 1559 finds her and brings her to her creator in hopes that they can help her get home.

If you don't care to Read Other Angel's dialogue:

Both girls use the arrow keys to move and jump. To swap, press ctrl. if you get stuck, press tab to reset the scene. On the final scene (you won't be able to swap), pressing tab will let you restart the game.

Missy can jump on blocks using the space bar.

Machine Code 1559 can shoot with the space bar and pick up things with shift.
